body:
Please add this parameter `dubbo.config-center.root-path` to resolve this issue:

```properties
dubbo.metadata-center.address = zookeeper://xxx?dubbo.config-center.root-path=/path/to/...
```
Can you tell me more about it?
provider is disconnected ,After restarting the service, the service is still unavailable, resulting in the consumer not being able to get the corresponding Dubbo connection

> Dubbo在没有配置元数据中的情况下，默认会基于注册中心生成元数据中心

这个和我理解的不太一致，理论上2.7.8版本没配置源数据中心的话是不会生成元数据中心的
Can you tell me more about it?
Let me have a look

> 这个和我理解的不太一致，理论上2.7.8版本没配置源数据中心的话是不会生成元数据中心的

The metadata center will be enabled if the registry supports.
let me have a look
let me have a look

> 这个是因为版本升级导致的吧

Who's your picture?
I use 2.7.6 as provider, 2.7.8 as consumer and open token check，but I see invoke sucess，you said  "服务提供者2.7.x 以下版本，服务开启token 认证" is which version ?

我是集成到springboot 2.2.5中，依赖dubbo starter 2.7.6和2.7.8
使用@ImportResource(locations = {"classpath:dubbo.xml"})
都有这个现象，多了个默认的application配置，应该不影响使用。
@caojiantong 你这个是因为 ZK使用默认元数据中心，导致监听了ZK / 节点导致的，看这里  #6780

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Failed to receive INITIALIZED event from zookeeper, pls. check if url zookeeper://localhost:2181/org.apache.dubbo.metadata.report.MetadataReport?dubbo.config-center.root-path=/&init.timeout=60000&timeout=60000 is correct


这个错应该是因为 ZK使用默认元数据中心，导致监听了ZK / 节点导致的， #6780
Please tell me which dubbo version you using?
let me see

> This is a known issue in 2.7.6 version that unable to discover interface with only `version` key or `group` key. It had been fixed in latest version. Also, you can try specify with `group` key.

@AlbumenJ Maybe this issue still exists in rmi and hessian protocol. See [this issue](https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues/6737). Please have a look.
mark
你没有创建动态配置的节点，http://dubbo.apache.org/zh-cn/docs/user/configuration/config-center.html看下文档和源码
you are right，we will fix it
Can you give me which class？ I can not find this code
动态配置节点？我就是按照文档流程操作的啊

2.7.2。the reason is the URL designed nonstandard, it's protect construcor exist problem. if we use it as generic invoke param. when providers received param.  PojoUtils.realize param. the error will occur.
consumer调用完provider就会清除所有attachment了
let me see

> A distributedly Locking issue.
> Another issue: `locks.remove(key)` should be put into a `finally` block to guarantee that the url key is removed when exception happens.

In fact, I understand here locks.remove Just to save space, even if it is not deleted, there will be no problem
Can you tell some more?

> locks.putIfAbsent() 返回旧值，如果原先key不在locks，返回的是null

I get it
mark
mark

please fix unit tests

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9292748/94925670-3142f300-04f2-11eb-8673-adfd04407df8.png)
lgtm, btw, would u pls add some ut cases for this fixed issue?
lgtm
lgtm, btw, would u pls add some ut cases for this fixed issue?
fine, this will make source code more readable!
lgtm

> please fix unit tests
> 
> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9292748/94925670-3142f300-04f2-11eb-8673-adfd04407df8.png)

Sorry, this is unreasonable, my approach has a great problem, I will resubmit after revision

there is no codecov change recently and also I can confirm codecov data is updated, for example:
https://codecov.io/gh/apache/dubbo/pulls

I also double check some of apache project:
`https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere-elasticjob/pull/1542`

codecov comment not showing too. so I guess it maybe some infra issue from codecov.
will follow up.

> lgtm, btw, would u pls add some ut cases for this fixed issue?

I understand that is to fix the overflow problem you said? Is there anything else that hasn't been done?
我理解就是修复你说的溢出问题吧？还有哪些点没做到吗？
看了文章还是有点不是很明白要怎么解决.
这里也有这个问题 https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues/3990
have the same problem

> dubbo-config-api.pom 文件中的maven的作用域更改一下。例如把test 注释掉
涉及test的标签很多，需要全部注释吗？
nacos升到最新1.3.2没用😓
let me see，I get it before

Fix https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues/6795
使用 dubbo.application.metadata-type=local 后依然有这个问题 只是注册到配置数据中的名称不同了，多了如：mapping-com.alibaba.cloud.dubbo.service.DubboMetadataService等
源码有处BUG，dubbo.application.metadata-type=local后依然还有少量记录
works now without any change in dubbo repo

泛化调用也是要写类名的

> > 泛化调用
> 
> 泛化调用也是要写类名的
类名可以做成配置，客户端改配置就好啦

> > > 泛化调用
> > 
> > 
> > 泛化调用也是要写类名的
> > 类名可以做成配置，客户端改配置就好啦

这样就需要修改代码配置，或者是修改配置中心的配置，都是需要客户端那边重新发布，一样需要修改。我们的理想是客户端不需要做任何处理 在我们调整代码的情况下。

> > > > 泛化调用
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 泛化调用也是要写类名的
> > > 类名可以做成配置，客户端改配置就好啦

I hava two modules A and B:
* B module provides a service named UserRpcService implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService to provide a UserDetailsService to spring-security framework.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10443318/96209587-90007600-0fa2-11eb-8ffa-5a406a6e7524.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10443318/96209636-ad354480-0fa2-11eb-9626-0fcbadf269b2.png)

如果你自己有思路可以自己fork下来自己改，远程调用本身就需要唯一标识，java里面唯一标识就是全类名，如果想客户端不动，那就要改成每次都要遍历所有暴露接口的方法，找到方法时再拼接类吗和包名，但是这样会引来很多问题，很多东西变得不规范，效率也会存在问题。
